programs.program_name: SARJANA MUDA KEJURUTERAAN AEROANGKASA DENGAN KEPUJIAN [AEROSPACE ENGINEERING]

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass with a minimum score of 10 and achieve at least Grade B in Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: STPM CGPA 2.75 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in Mathematics T and any 1 of the following subjects, Physics, Chemistry, Biology.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Foundation CGPA 2.75 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in Mathematics and any 1 following subjects, Physics / Engineering Physics, Mathematics, Biology / Chemistry / Computer Science / Engineering Chemistry / Basic Engineering.
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma: Pass the International Baccalaureate (IB) with a minimum score of 28 and achieve at least a score of 5 at the High Level (HL) in Mathematics and Physics and at least a score of 5 at the Standard Level (SL) in Chemistry.
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: Pass with a minimum aggregate of 68 and achieve at least Grade B in Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

A-Level.text: Pass with a minimum score of 10 and achieve at least Grade B in Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

STPM.text: STPM CGPA 2.75 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in Mathematics T and any 1 of the following subjects, Physics, Chemistry, Biology.

Foundation.text: Foundation CGPA 2.75 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in Mathematics and any 1 following subjects, Physics / Engineering Physics, Mathematics, Biology / Chemistry / Computer Science / Engineering Chemistry / Basic Engineering.

IB Diploma.text: Pass the International Baccalaureate (IB) with a minimum score of 28 and achieve at least a score of 5 at the High Level (HL) in Mathematics and Physics and at least a score of 5 at the Standard Level (SL) in Chemistry.

SACE/WACE.text: Pass with a minimum aggregate of 68 and achieve at least Grade B in Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

programs.program_name: SARJANA MUDA KEJURUTERAAN AWAM DENGAN KEPUJIAN [CIVIL ENGINEERING]

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass with a minimum score of 10 and achieve at least Grade B in Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Minimum CGPA 3.00.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: STPM CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in Physics, Mathematics T, Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Foundation CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in 2 following subjects, Mathematics, Physics / Engineering Physics, Chemistry / Engineering Chemistry, Biology, Basic Engineering / Civil Engineering / Mechanical Engineering / Electrical & Electronics Engineering.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma: Pass the International Baccalaureate (IB) with a minimum score of 28 and achieve at least a score of 5 at the High Level (HL) in the following subjects, Physics and Mathematics and at least a score of 5 at the Standard Level (SL) in Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: Pass with a minimum aggregate of 68 and achieve at least Grade B in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level

A-Level.text: Pass with a minimum score of 10 and achieve at least Grade B in Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level

Diploma.text: Minimum CGPA 3.00.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level

STPM.text: STPM CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in Physics, Mathematics T, Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level

Foundation.text: Foundation CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in 2 following subjects, Mathematics, Physics / Engineering Physics, Chemistry / Engineering Chemistry, Biology, Basic Engineering / Civil Engineering / Mechanical Engineering / Electrical & Electronics Engineering.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level

IB Diploma.text: Pass the International Baccalaureate (IB) with a minimum score of 28 and achieve at least a score of 5 at the High Level (HL) in the following subjects, Physics and Mathematics and at least a score of 5 at the Standard Level (SL) in Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level

SACE/WACE.text: Pass with a minimum aggregate of 68 and achieve at least Grade B in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry / Biology.  Credit in the Mathematics subject at the SPM level

entry_requirements_raw.Degree:
(NOTE: Subject to further approval by the admission office) Degree in Health Sciences / Pure Sciences / Applied Sciences with a minimum CGPA of 3.00.  Grade B at the SPM/equivalent level in the following two (2) subjects:
Biology
Chemistry
Physics
Credit in the following three (3) subjects:
English
Mathematics
Additional Mathematics
One (1) other subject
Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
Pass with a minimum grade of BBB, ABC, or AAC in the following subjects, Biology, Chemistry, Physics / Mathematics.  Grade B at the SPM/equivalent level in the following two (2) subjects:
Biology
Chemistry
Physics
Credit in the following three (3) subjects:
English
Mathematics
Additional Mathematics
One (1) other subject
Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
STPM CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics T.  Grade B at the SPM level in the following five (5) subjects:
Biology
Physics
Chemistry
Mathematics / Additional Mathematics
Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
(NOTE: Not applicable for foundation qualification from private institutions) Pass Matrikulasi KPM or Asasi UM/UKM/UiTM with min. CGPA 3.00 and at least grade B (3.00) in the following 3 subjects: Biology, Chemistry, Physics / Mathematics.  Grade B at the SPM level in the following five (5) subjects:
Biology
Physics
Chemistry
Mathematics / Additional Mathematics
Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.CPU:
(NOTE: Subject to further approval by the admission office) Pass with a minimum average of 70% in the following 3 subjects, Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  Grade B at the SPM/equivalent level in the following two (2) subjects:
Biology
Chemistry
Physics
Credit in the following three (3) subjects:
English
Mathematics
Additional Mathematics
One (1) other subject
Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma:
(NOTE: Subject to further approval by the admission office) Pass minimum overall score of 30 and obtain a minimum score of 5 in each of the following 3 subjects, Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  Grade B at the SPM/equivalent level in the following two (2) subjects:
Biology
Chemistry
Physics
Credit in the following three (3) subjects:
English
Mathematics
Additional Mathematics
One (1) other subject
Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
(NOTE: Subject to further approval by the admission office) Pass With a minimum aggregate or average of 80% or equivalent to a grade B in any THREE (3) of the following subjects, Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.  Grade B at the SPM/equivalent level in the following two (2) subjects:
Biology
Chemistry
Physics
Credit in the following three (3) subjects:
English
Mathematics
Additional Mathematics
One (1) other subject
Pass interview

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass with a minimum score of 11 and achieve at least Grade C in any two (2) of the following subjects, Mathematics, Accounting, Further Mathematics, Business Studies.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: STPM CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in any 2 of the following subjects, Ekonomi and Geografi, Sejarah, Bahasa Melayu, Pengajian Perniagaan, Perakaunan, Mathematics M.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Foundation CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in any 2 of the following subjects, Ekonomi, Mathematics / Accounting / Financial Accounting / Management Accounting / Pengurusan Perniagaan / Business and Technology.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma: Pass with a minimum score of 29 and achieve at least a score of 4 in the subject of Economics at the High Level (HL) and one (1) other subject at the Standard Level (SL) as follows, Business and Management, Mathematical Studies, Mathematical Methods, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Economics.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: Pass with a minimum aggregate of 68 and achieve at least Grade B in the subject of Economics and any one (1) of the following subjects, Accounting / Accounting and Finance, Mathematical Studies, Specialist Mathematics, Business Management & Enterprise.  Pass interview

A-Level.text: Pass with a minimum score of 11 and achieve at least Grade C in any two (2) of the following subjects, Mathematics, Accounting, Further Mathematics, Business Studies.  Pass interview

STPM.text: STPM CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in any 2 of the following subjects, Ekonomi and Geografi, Sejarah, Bahasa Melayu, Pengajian Perniagaan, Perakaunan, Mathematics M.  Pass interview

Foundation.text: Foundation CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade B (CGPA 3.00) in any 2 of the following subjects, Ekonomi, Mathematics / Accounting / Financial Accounting / Management Accounting / Pengurusan Perniagaan / Business and Technology.  Pass interview

IB Diploma.text: Pass with a minimum score of 29 and achieve at least a score of 4 in the subject of Economics at the High Level (HL) and one (1) other subject at the Standard Level (SL) as follows, Business and Management, Mathematical Studies, Mathematical Methods, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Economics.  Pass interview

SACE/WACE.text: Pass with a minimum aggregate of 68 and achieve at least Grade B in the subject of Economics and any one (1) of the following subjects, Accounting / Accounting and Finance, Mathematical Studies, Specialist Mathematics, Business Management & Enterprise.  Pass interview

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass with a minimum score of 10 and achieve at least Grade C in any 2 of the following subjects, Biology, Chemistry, Physics / Mathematics.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: STPM CGPA 3.00 with minimum grade C+ (CGPA 2.33) in Mathematics T and any 2 of the following subjects, Chemistry, Biology and Physics / Mathematics.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Foundation CGPA 2.75 with minimum grade C+ (CGPA 2.33) in Mathematics T and any 2 of the following subjects, Chemistry, Biology and Physics / Mathematics.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma: Pass the International Baccalaureate (IB) with a minimum score of 24 and achieve at least a score of 4 at the High Level (HL) in any 2 of the following subjects, Biology, Chemistry, Physics / Mathematics.  Pass interview
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE: Pass with a minimum aggregate of 45 and obtain at least a Grade C in any two (2) of the following subjects, Biology, Chemistry, Physics / Mathematics.  Pass interview
